[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1675151912055{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1675152034792{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Graphology Handwriting Analysis Expert in Toronto and Canada” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:28|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis (formerly known as the Canadian College of Kineseography) was founded in Toronto in the 1980s. We are experts in the field of handwriting analysis and forgery detection. Our work involves comparing signatures, handwriting, and printing to detect alterations or forgeries.

Documents are questioned and disputed for an array of reasons, but most commonly these disputes relate to fraud, alleged revision, holographic wills, typewritten documents, and anonymous letters. The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis is court-qualified in Ontario, Quebec, Alberta and Newfoundland, having been accepted by these courts.

Collectively, we have more than 30 years of experience in graphology handwriting analysis and we maintain high standards. We are dedicated to meeting the specific needs of each of our clients, and all of our experts are highly accredited, certified, and court-qualified.

To find out more about the graphology handwriting analysis services that we offer and the Canadian System of Handwriting Analysis, see below.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1675151967759{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”What is the Canadian System of Handwriting Analysis?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]The Canadian System of Handwriting Analysis is a powerful system of graphology combined with handwriting analysis that is unique as follows:

  • It is devoid of sensationalism and sweeping generalizations found in other systems.
  • It has been substantiated by years of European graphological research as well as a lifetime of research into these theories by our founder.
  • It is a sensitive register of the complex human psyche and nervous system.
  • It is a detailed monitor of the mind and body, explaining the physical side of poor penmanship.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Graphology” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Graphology is a generic term applied to any form of handwriting analysis, including forensic handwriting analysis. There are a number of different systems of graphology, for example, French graphology and Indian graphology. Our Founder studied Graphoanalysis at the International Graphoanalysis Society in Chicago (Graphoanalysis being an American system of graphology with different interpretations for different strokes). After completing her studies in Graphoanalysis, she researched the theories presented in this study with her students and eliminated those that were incorrect and harmful. She then developed her own Canadian system.

Here at the Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis, we strive to avoid the extreme and sensational claims that have been found in over-the-counter graphology books and take a holistic approach to handwriting analysis.

Our founder’s background in neuro and gross anatomy, nutrition, and art analysis has increased her awareness of the physical side of handwriting. Our system takes handwriting movements and emotionally significant symbols into consideration for a well-rounded approach to the analysis of handwriting.

We have many years of experience in this system of examination and our work has taken us all over Canada. We are professional and dedicated to this holistic approach to analysis and fraud detection.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Looking for Graphology Handwriting Analysis in Toronto or Canada? Contact the Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis Today” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]The Centre for Canadian Handwriting Analysis offers several graphology handwriting analysis services, including document examination, expert witness testimony, and forensic handwriting analysis.

To find out more about how can help you, get in contact today.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
